headline: Gentherm says William Presley to succeed Phillip Eyler as CEO
summary: Gentherm (THRM) announced its planned CEO succession, effective January 1, 2025. Gentherm’s current President and CEO, Phillip Eyler, will be succeeded by William Presley, who currently serves as Vice Chairman and COO of Aptiv (APTV), and will become the next President and CEO of Gentherm. Presley will also be appointed by the Board to fill the vacancy following Eyler’s resignation from the Board. Eyler has agreed to remain as an advisor to Presley and the company through June 30, 2025. The comp
